NZXTSharp Docs

Welcome to the docs for NZXTSharp!

NZXTSharp is the one-stop .NET Standard (C#) SDK for NZXT devices.

You can find NZXTSharp on NuGet, and GitHub.

I strongly reccommend reading all the material in this page, and on the documentation pages, it will help a lot with your understanding of NZXTSharp and how it works.

NZXTSharp's syntax is designed to be simple and easy to use. The structure is built around devices, effects, and params. Effects are created with params, and effects are applied to devices. Devices may also have other methods relevant to their corresponding product's functionality. Devices are the main point that the user of the SDK will interact with.

Here is a basic getting started example for the Hue+: 
using NZXTSharp;
using NZXTSharp.HuePlus;

HuePlus hue = new HuePlus();

Fixed effect = new Fixed(new Color(255, 255, 255)); // Create effect object
hue.ApplyEffect(hue.Both, effect); // Apply effect to both channels

Supported devices:
  • Hue+
  • KrakenX (x42, x52, x62, x72)
